commit message: Initial commit
Got a skeleton widget working, which displays the icon
Changed the scale type of the image to CENTER_CROP
Got some layouts worked out
Put some ids in activity_configuration.xml
Added numColumns to the gridview

Working on the persistence model

- Made a skeleton singleton persistence manager
- Made a data structure for albums
- Made a parser to switch between albums and a JSON representation for
them
Filled out more of the persistence manager, got rid of the singleton pattern
Finished the persistence manager for now
Finally got the onUpdate right so the widget opens the configuration activity properly
Changed it to default to 1x1, the configuration activity doesn't instantly close, cleaned up res/
Cleaned up packages
Added the action bar icons
Made the persistence manager listen for shared prefs changes, so multiple instances stay up to date
Changed the configuration activity to use an @string/ for the title
As requested, changed the name to PuppyFrame
Added a default layout/look for when there are no albums
Added delete functionality to the persistence manager
Got some skeleton work in for the edit/add album activity
Got some basic flow working for the editing activity, it can now actually make and save empty albums
Changed this to an Android Studio project

Finally got image selection to work
Got the albums activity showing the albums and such
Pretty much finished the settings menu
